name: Wolves on the Westwind
description:
Ulisses Spiele is the publisher behind the most successful German-language role-playing game, The Dark Eye, which has been enchanting players and fans story-telling alike for almost forty years and spawned over 200 books, tabletop RPGs and video games.

With over 60 employees in Europe and the US, the publishing house based in Waldems, Hesse, is one of the industry leaders in publishing role-playing games and creating living, breathing worlds across books, audio and, since 2021, computer games. In addition to other proprietary game lines such as HeXXen 1733 and the card game Aventuria, Ulisses Spiele also publishes German-language translations of international role-playing games, such as Alien - The Roleplaying Game, Pathfinder or Warhammer Fantasy Roleplaying.
